description:
A teacher at Hakuou Academy. He is seen building Gundam models in the staff room or during lunch. He spends all his money buying Gundam models and even borrows money from Yukiji to buy more. He is 28 years old but he is still single and without a girlfriend.
In episode 29, it is revealed that he`s had feelings for Yukiji, whom he`s known from childhood.
name: Kaoru Kyounosuke
